Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Combine ground beef, onions, and parsley in a large bowl. In a separate bowl, mix allspice, 1 teaspoon of salt, and 1 teaspoon of pepper; then add this to the beef mixture and combine thoroughly. Spread the beef mixture evenly in a casserole dish, leaving a little space from the edges.

Layer the potato slices over the beef mixture; sprinkle with 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper. Place tomato slices on top of the potatoes; season with another 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.
Pour 1/2 cup of water around and over the layers of beef, potatoes, and tomatoes.
Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.

Combine tahini and lemon juice in a bowl, mixing until smooth. Gradually add the remaining 1 cup of water to the tahini mixture, stirring until fully blended and smooth; then pour it over and around the layers of beef, potatoes, and tomatoes.
Continue baking until the beef is cooked through and no longer pink in the center, and the potatoes are soft, approximately an additional 30 minutes.
